name: Precision Aura
desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

name: Nightmare
desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

name: Decay
desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Cloak and Dagger
desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

name: Epicenter
desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

name: Dual Breath
desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

name: Ignite
desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

name: Borrowed Time
desc: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Burrowstrike
desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Infernal Blade
desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for 0.6 seconds and applies a 4 second burn that deals 25 + 1.25/2.5/3.75/5% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.
